import ExpnDate from './ExpnDate' import './ExpenseItem.css' import Card from '../UI/Card' import { useState } from 'react' const ExpenseItem = (props) => { const expAmount = props.amount useState(props.title) const clickHandler = () => { expnTitle = 'Update!' console.log(expnTitle) } return (

{expnTitle}

{expAmount}
 ) } export default ExpenseItem
